item.description:
Hi All,

I'm putting this on the calendar to make it easier for those who are interested to coordinate. I won't be able to make it, but it sounds like a great program, and maybe the folks who go can meetup for dinner or drinks after. Enjoy!

Time: April 10, 2010 from 3pm to 6pm
Location: Belmont WheelWorks
Event Description:
Join USAT Coaches Jared Gell (Competitive Instinct Multisport) and Matt Giunta (Blueshift Multisport) for an afternoon of (free) workshops, presentations, and Q&A designed to help you take your next steps in triathlon.
item.name: FREE Seminar: Triathlon 101 - Beginners & Stepping up to Long Course
